title: Warriors and Wizards
description: Five great sagas of swords and sorcery by L. Sprague de Camp, Fritz Leiber, Andre Norton, Avram Davidson and Lin Carter. Edited by Lin Carter.Contents: * "Introduction: Warriors and Wizards" by Lin Carter * "Two Yards of Dragon" (Eudoric Dambertson) by L. Sprague de Camp * "The Frost Monstreme" (Fafhrd and the Gray Mouser) by Fritz Leiber * "Spider Silk" (Witch World) by Andre Norton * "The Curious Custom of the Turjan Seraad" (Amalrik the Mangod) by Lin Carter * "Caravan to Illiel" by Avram Davidson
author: Lin Carter
